summary.Title: SimSports Product Manager
summary.Presentation:
Asetek Denmark A/S is looking for a Product Manager for its SimSports line of products 

 

Do you want to join a dedicated and dynamic team working on innovative products

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Asetek Denmark A/S is looking for a Product Manager for its SimSports line of products

Do you want to join a dedicated and dynamic team working on innovative products within the simulator gaming sector? We at Asetek threw ourselves headfirst into the simsports market last year and have made amazing strides in a very short time period, setting new market standards with our premium hydraulic cylinder pedals and recently launching a more reasonable load-cell alternative. Our ambition doesn’t stop there, we want to become a next level immersive sim racing hardware provider, and do this while staying close to our heritage from the “real” racing industry, as well as our technical capabilities as an innovative and quality hardware producer.

Requirements:

  • The job is located at the corporate headquarters in Aalborg, Denmark.
  • Experience from hardware product marketing or product management.
  • Ideally you have experience from simulator racing equipment or car/race car sector, either through personal interest or professional engagement.

You will get a central role in the product development team in Aalborg, working with both the marketing team, research and development department, and CEO André Eriksen in developing next level simulator racing equipment, reporting to our Manager for B2C marketing and product development.

You will be involved in product strategy, product roadmaps, product performance and pricing in order to ensure that Asetek stays competitive and innovative in its product strategy.

You have a solid commercial background within product management or product marketing. You have experience in developing product requirement documents, product BOMs and new product business cases. You’ve previously worked with consumer hardware and have experience from retail, etail and market research, enabling you to spot trends in the market.

You will be an active part of a dynamic team, working with a high degree of autonomy and in an informal atmosphere and we expect you to be someone who takes initiative, gets things done and take ownership over your actions. You’re not afraid of getting your hands dirty down in the machinery of our products, while keeping the commercial and strategic perspective front of mind.
